hero.title: Make AI agents your competitive advantage
hero.subtitle: Securely connect AI to your company's knowledge with full confidence.
hero.labLink: EggOn Lab — Meet the team dedicated to making AI agents explainable.

collection.title: AI Agent Collection
collection.subtitle: Discover our curated collection of AI agents designed for legal, financial and business professionals.

contractAnalysis.title: Contract Analysis Agent
contractAnalysis.body: Analyze legal contracts and agreements to identify key clauses, potential risks, and inconsistencies across multiple documents for mergers, acquisitions, and other transactions. Provide a concise summary with explanations and actionable recommendations.

caseLawResearch.title: Precedent-Based Strategy Agent
caseLawResearch.body: Enhance legal research by smartly identifying and retrieving relevant case law, statutes, and doctrines, delivering attorneys actionable recommendations based on precedent analysis and local legal nuances.

meetingPrep.title: Meeting Summary Agent
meetingPrep.body: Listen to or analyze meeting notes, extract key points, and automatically convert decisions and discussions into actionable tasks with assigned owners and deadlines.

wikiBuilder.title: Internal Knowledge Builder Agent
wikiBuilder.body: Creates and maintains a private internal wiki by analyzing internal documents and authorized public conversations. Automatically tags and categorizes entries.

auditTrail.title: Prompt Improvement Agent
auditTrail.body: Analyze prompts used, identify weaknesses, and generate optimized versions to improve the accuracy, clarity, and consistency of AI model responses.

supplierCompliance.title: Compliance & policy Agent
supplierCompliance.body: Teams can navigate internal and external policy documents to ensure adherence to requirements and reduce dependency on manual reviews from compliance teams.

quotationAgent.title: Quotation Generator Agent
quotationAgent.body: Generate and send professional client-ready quotations based on product configurations, pricing rules, and customer data.

clientOnboarding.title: Competitive Intelligence Agent
clientOnboarding.body: Automatically monitor competitor activity (appointments, new specialties, partnerships), analyze pricing strategies and innovative service offers, and identify positioning in new markets or emerging technologies.

techIntelligence.title: Technology Intelligence Agent
techIntelligence.body: Weekly summaries of key news and trends in a selected technology sector, including key sources, highlights, and regulatory updates.

rfpDrafting.title: Legal Spend Management Agent
rfpDrafting.body: Analyzes and reviews invoices, checks compliance with Outside Counsel Guidelines and agreed hourly rates, detects billing anomalies, tracks budgets, and forecasts accruals. Provides adjustment recommendations and compliance reports.

esgCompliance.title: Interactive Financial Reporting Agent
esgCompliance.body: Produce a dynamic dashboard showing profitability by case, lawyer, or client, with natural language query capability (e.g., 'Show margin on litigation cases since January'). Integrates with Power BI or Tableau, conversational LLM interface.

dataPrivacyAudit.title: Tax Compliance Agent
dataPrivacyAudit.body: Helps tax professionals navigate complex and changing tax regulations across multiple jurisdictions, ensuring compliance while identifying optimization opportunities.

deployment.title: Deploy in our cloud or yours
deployment.subtitle: Choose the deployment model that best fits your security, compliance, and infrastructure needs.

cards.title: EggOn Cloud
cards.description: Leverage a fully managed, highly secure SaaS offering on EggOn infrastructure

cards.title: Azure Private Cloud
cards.description: Deploy within your virtual private cloud (Azure environment)

benefits.title: Our Benefits
benefits.item1: Contextualize a large language model (GPT, etc.) with your company's data (RAG / Context Engineering).
benefits.item2: Specialized AI agents for targeted tasks, designed to deliver a fast return on investment (Agentic AI).
benefits.item3: Integrations to connect your information systems and remove silos while respecting existing rights and regulations.
benefits.item4: Confidentiality and compliance: your data remains within your secure environment.
benefits.item5: Expert support and personalized guidance throughout your AI transformation, delivered by teams experienced in your sector (legaltech, fintech, etc.).

legalStack.subtitle: WHY EGGON
legalStack.title: Unlock the Power of Contextual AI
legalStack.description: Leverage a state-of-the-art AI platform with deep legal and financial expertise to deliver measurable performance and operational gains.

benefits.title: Domain-embedded Expertise
benefits.description: AI, AI agents, and workflows designed by experts from legaltech and fintech, already familiar with your technology environment and security requirements.

benefits.title: Contextualization of Your AI
benefits.description: Domain-specialized RAG architecture reducing hallucinations and improving AI model relevance using your data and our contextual and prompt engineering.

benefits.title: From Pilot to Production
benefits.description: Operational support and production deployment alongside you, in addition to developing, configuring, and testing.

benefits.title: Enterprise-grade Security & Governance
benefits.description: Built-in compliance and traceability — SOC 2, role-based access, end-to-end encryption, and auditable logs for every AI output.

stackComponents.title: Connect Your Internal Databases to a Large Language Model (RAG)
stackComponents.description: We connect your case files, contracts, and legal databases directly to AI models. Your confidential data remains secure while you get instant, accurate answers from your entire knowledge base.

stackComponents.title: Build Your AI Agents
stackComponents.description: We develop AI agents—using Microsoft Azure Studio or your own technical environment—that manage your specific legal workflows. Process sensitive documents with models that never leave your infrastructure.

stackComponents.title: Build Multi-Agent Systems
stackComponents.description: Automate complex legal processes with multiple AI agents working together. Delegate tasks end-to-end, from document review to drafting and legal research.

stackComponents.title: Chatbot Interface & API Connectivity
stackComponents.description: Ask questions in plain language and get instant answers from all your files. Automatically analyze contracts, process legal documents, and assist with legal research—fully integrated with your existing databases.

academie.mainTitle: BE PART OF THE LEARNING JOURNEY

intro.left: We are here to create and inspire through legal innovation and AI. Our IA Académie is just the beginning – we believe in experimenting with all forms of legal practice, digital or physical.
intro.right: As AI evolves in the legal field, we're excited to explore and embrace new ideas. Collaboration is at the heart of our approach, and we're eager to team up with lawyers on innovative projects.

nog.intro: Right now, clients are asking the eggon team to:

noglab.heroSubtitle: We are building a future where professionals, particularly in law, finance, and healthcare, can deploy AI agents that are certified compliant, auditable, and insurable.
noglab.title: Make your AI Agents Insurable
noglab.intro1: EggOn Lab is dedicated to the governance and traceability of artificial intelligence agents through a next-generation orchestrator.
noglab.intro2: We are building a future where professionals — especially in law, finance, and healthcare — can deploy AI agents that are certified compliant, auditable, and insurable.
noglab.intro3: We are engineers and builders who have worked for some of the most secure tech companies, including iManage, and for industry leaders as Traceability System Experts and Quality Engineers.

legitimacy.title: Legitimacy in AI Is About More Than Right or Wrong Answers
legitimacy.paragraph1: AI capabilities are advancing at an unprecedented pace, but one major problem remains: opacity.
legitimacy.paragraph2: This opacity is even more concerning as AI enters sectors that are not like any other industries: justice and healthcare. These are the foundations of a free and fair society.
legitimacy.paragraph3: Every day, courts make decisions that change the course of human lives. Such decisions demand empathy, experience, and context — but also a process that feels legitimate to those affected.
legitimacy.paragraph4: No family should ever wonder if they lost custody because of a poorly calibrated algorithm. No patient should ever doubt that their treatment was decided after genuine human evaluation.
legitimacy.paragraph5: The real issue isn't simply whether AI gives the right or wrong answer — it's doubt. And once doubt sets in, it erodes trust and undermines the legitimacy of our systems.

aiForEveryone.title: AI That Works for Everyone
aiForEveryone.paragraph1: Knowledge of how AI agents operate and make decisions must not remain concentrated in a few labs.
aiForEveryone.paragraph2: This lack of transparency slows adoption in high-responsibility professions, and the absence of explainability makes insuring AI-driven processes impossible.
aiForEveryone.paragraph3: To bridge this gap, we created N.O.G (Nested Orchestration & Governance) — a platform designed to understand, audit, and certify AI agents.

explicability.title: Explicability
explicability.description: Every task executed by an AI agent must be understandable and explainable. Users must be able to trace the full reasoning and verify its legitimacy.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Explainability only matters if it's shared. Results and supporting evidence must be easy to access for everyone impacted by a decision.

recall.title: Recall
recall.description: If bias, error, or manipulation is detected, the system must allow for immediate recall — just like product recalls in critical industries. Governed AI should never be irreversible.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Compliance must not slow innovation. Explainable AI should be as fast as it is powerful, accelerating adoption while building trust.

growth.title: Growth Step by Step
growth.paragraph1: Engineering and product co-design enable iterative improvement through deployment, while great products and partner feedback strengthen each other. Products keep us grounded in reality and guide us to solve the most impactful problems with our design partners.
growth.paragraph2: Empirical and iterative approach to explainable AI is the most effective and reliable measures come from a combination of proactive development and feedback from careful real-world testing with experienced professionals.
growth.paragraph3: We plan to contribute to AI legitimacy by (1) maintaining a high security bar — preventing attacks, (2) sharing best practices and frameworks for building safe AI systems with our clients, and (3) accelerating new types of certifications on alignment by sharing our new reference standards and agent specifications.
growth.paragraph4: We believe that methods developed for today's systems, such as effective red-teaming and post-deployment monitoring, provide valuable insights that will extend to future, more explainable systems.

measure.title: Measure what truly matters
measure.description: We will focus on understanding how our systems create genuine value in the real world. The most important breakthroughs often come from rethinking our objectives, not just optimizing existing metrics.
